00053 template <class sTraits> bool mfPgReader<sTraits>::read(sMesh* malha, char* xml)
00054 {
00055         MF_ASSERT(malha);
00056         MF_ASSERT(xml);
00057 
00058         PGconn     *conn;
00059         PGresult   *res;
00060         char conn_str[MAX_BUFFER], buffer[MAX_BUFFER];
00061         int i,nv,nc;
00062         
00063         MF_ASSERT(conn_str);
00064         MF_ASSERT(buffer);
00065 
00066         mfXmlParser config;
00067         
00068         config.read(xml);
00069         
00070         sprintf(conn_str,"host=%s port=%s dbname=%s user=%s password=%s",config.getHost(),config.getPort(),
00071         config.getDataBase(),config.getUser(),config.getPassword());
00072                 
00073         conn = PQconnectdb(conn_str);   
00074          
00075         if (PQstatus(conn) != CONNECTION_OK)
00076         {
00077                 fprintf(stderr, "Connection to database failed: %s",PQerrorMessage(conn));
00078                 PQfinish(conn);
00079                 return false;           
00080         }
00081 
00082         cout << "Postgres conectado." << endl;
00083         
00084         sprintf(buffer, "SELECT count(*) as num FROM %s", config.getVerticesTable());
00085         res = PQexec(conn, buffer);
00086     if (PQresultStatus(res) != PGRES_TUPLES_OK)
00087     {
00088         fprintf(stderr, "SELECT failed: %s", PQerrorMessage(conn));
00089         PQclear(res);
00090                 PQfinish(conn);
00091                 return false;           
00092     }
00093 
00094         nv = atoi(PQgetvalue(res, 0, 0));
00095         MF_ASSERT(nv > 0);
00096         //cout << "Numero de vertices :" << nv << endl;;
00097         
00098         PQclear(res);
00099   
00100                 
00101         pthread_t *tid = new pthread_t[this->nthreadsv];
00102         mfTReaderData *pdobj = new mfTReaderData[this->nthreadsv]();
00103 
00104         MF_ASSERT(tid);
00105         MF_ASSERT(pdobj);
00106 
00107         ids qtd = nv / this->nthreadsv;
00108         ids start = 0;
00109         
00110         //cout << "Quantidade por thread:" << qtd << endl;
00111         
00112         for (i = 0; i < this->nthreadsv; i++)
00113         {
00114                 pdobj[i].id = i;                
00115                 pdobj[i].str = conn_str;
00116                 pdobj[i].start = start;
00117                 pdobj[i].end = start + qtd;
00118                 if(pdobj[i].end >= nv) pdobj[i].end = nv-1;
00119                 pdobj[i].malha = malha;
00120                 pdobj[i].config = &config;
00121                 
00122                 start += qtd + 1;
00123                 
00124                 pthread_create(&tid[i], NULL,  (void * (*)(void*))&threadPoint, &pdobj[i]);
00125         }
00126         
00127         for (i = 0; i < this->nthreadsv; i++)
00128                 pthread_join(tid[i], NULL);
00129         
00130         malha->setNumberOfVertices(nv);
00131         
00132         //cout << "Leitura dos vertices concluida." << endl;
00133         
00134         delete [] tid;
00135         delete [] pdobj;
00136         
00137         // leitura das celulas
00138 
00139         tid = new pthread_t[this->nthreadsc];
00140         pdobj = new mfTReaderData[this->nthreadsc]();
00141         MF_ASSERT(tid);
00142         MF_ASSERT(pdobj);
00143 
00144         sprintf(buffer, "SELECT count(*) as num FROM %s", config.getCellsTable());
00145         res = PQexec(conn, buffer);
00146     if (PQresultStatus(res) != PGRES_TUPLES_OK)
00147     {
00148         fprintf(stderr, "SELECT failed: %s", PQerrorMessage(conn));
00149         PQclear(res);
00150                 PQfinish(conn);
00151                 return false;
00152     }
00153 
00154         nc = atoi(PQgetvalue(res, 0, 0));
00155         MF_ASSERT(nc > 0);
00156         //cout << "Numero de celulas :" << nc << endl;;
00157         
00158         PQclear(res);
00159         
00160                 
00161         qtd = nc / this->nthreadsc;
00162         start = 0;
00163         
00164         //cout << "Quantidade por thread:" << qtd << endl;
00165         
00166         for (i = 0; i < this->nthreadsc; i++)
00167         {
00168                 pdobj[i].id = i;                
00169                 pdobj[i].str = conn_str;
00170                 pdobj[i].start = start;
00171                 pdobj[i].end = start + qtd;
00172                 if(pdobj[i].end >= nc) pdobj[i].end = nc - 1;
00173                 pdobj[i].malha = malha;
00174                 pdobj[i].config = &config;
00175         
00176                 start += qtd + 1;
00177                 
00178                 pthread_create(&tid[i], NULL, (void * (*)(void*)) &threadCell, &pdobj[i]);
00179         }
00180         
00181         for (i = 0; i < this->nthreadsc; i++)
00182                 pthread_join(tid[i], NULL);
00183         
00184         malha->setNumberOfCells(nc);
00185         
00186         //cout << "Leitura das celulas concluida." << endl;
00187 
00188         delete [] tid;
00189         delete [] pdobj;
00190         
00191         PQfinish(conn);
00192                 
00193         return true;
00194 }

00196 template <class sTraits> void* mfPgReader<sTraits>::threadPoint(mfTReaderData* obj)
00197 {
00198         MF_ASSERT(obj);
00199         PGconn     *conn;
00200         PGresult   *res;
00201         char buffer[MAX_BUFFER];
00202         MF_ASSERT(buffer);
00203         ids start, end, qtd;
00204         
00205         conn = PQconnectdb(obj->str);
00206          
00207         if (PQstatus(conn) != CONNECTION_OK) 
00208         {
00209                 fprintf(stderr, "Connection to database failed: %s",PQerrorMessage(conn));
00210                 PQfinish(conn);
00211                 return false;           
00212         }
00213 
00214 
00215         qtd = MF_TREADER_QTDSQL;
00216         MF_ASSERT(qtd > 0);
00217         start = obj->start;
00218         while(start <= obj->end)
00219         {
00220                 end = start + qtd;
00221                 if(end > obj->end) end = obj->end;
00222                         
00223                 sprintf(buffer, "SELECT * FROM %s WHERE ((%s >= %d) and (%s <= %d))",
00224                 obj->config->getVerticesTable(), obj->config->getVerticesIdField(), start,
00225                 obj->config->getVerticesIdField(), end);
00226                 res = PQexec(conn, buffer);
00227         
00228                 if (PQresultStatus(res) != PGRES_TUPLES_OK)
00229                 {
00230                         fprintf(stderr, "SELECT failed: %s", PQerrorMessage(conn));
00231                         PQclear(res);
00232                         PQfinish(conn);
00233                         return false;           
00234                 }
00235                 else
00236                 {
00237                         int id_fnum, x_fnum, y_fnum, z_fnum, id, num, i;
00238                         space coords[sVertex::getDimension()];
00239                         
00240                         id_fnum = PQfnumber(res, obj->config->getVerticesIdField());
00241                         x_fnum  = PQfnumber(res, obj->config->getVerticesField(0));
00242                         y_fnum  = PQfnumber(res, obj->config->getVerticesField(1));
00243                         if(sVertex::getDimension() == 3)
00244                                 z_fnum  = PQfnumber(res, obj->config->getVerticesField(2));
00245                         
00246                         num = PQntuples(res);
00247                         MF_ASSERT(num > 0);
00248                         for(i = 0; i < num; i++)
00249                         {
00250                                 id = atoi(PQgetvalue(res, i, id_fnum));
00251                                 coords[0]  = atmf(PQgetvalue(res, i, x_fnum));                  
00252                                 coords[1]  = atmf(PQgetvalue(res, i, y_fnum));
00253                                 if(sVertex::getDimension() == 3)
00254                                         coords[2]  = atmf(PQgetvalue(res, i, z_fnum));
00255                                 
00256                                 //cout << "Adicionando o vertice: " << id << endl;
00257                                 obj->malha->addVertex(id,coords);
00258                         }
00259                 }
00260                 start += qtd + 1;
00261             PQclear(res);
00262         }
00263 
00264         PQfinish(conn);
00265         
00266         //cout << "Thread " << obj->id << " desconectada." << endl;
00267         
00268         //pthread_exit(NULL);
00269         
00270         return NULL;
00271 }

00273 template <class sTraits> void* mfPgReader<sTraits>::threadCell(mfTReaderData* obj)
00274 {
00275         MF_ASSERT(obj);
00276         PGconn     *conn;
00277         PGresult   *res;
00278         char buffer[MAX_BUFFER];
00279         MF_ASSERT(buffer);
00280         ids start, end, qtd;
00281         
00282         conn = PQconnectdb(obj->str);
00283          
00284         if (PQstatus(conn) != CONNECTION_OK)
00285         {
00286                 fprintf(stderr, "Connection to database failed: %s",PQerrorMessage(conn));
00287                 PQfinish(conn);
00288                 return false;           
00289         }
00290 
00291         
00292         int id_fnum, v1_fnum, v2_fnum, v3_fnum, v4_fnum;
00293         ids id, v[sCell::getDimension()], num, i;
00294         
00295         qtd = MF_TREADER_QTDSQL;
00296         MF_ASSERT(qtd > 0);
00297         start = obj->start;
00298         while(start <= obj->end)
00299         {
00300                 end = start + qtd;
00301                 if(end > obj->end) end = obj->end;
00302                         
00303                 sprintf(buffer, "SELECT * FROM %s WHERE ((%s >= %d) and (%s <= %d))",
00304                 obj->config->getCellsTable(), obj->config->getCellsIdField(), start,
00305                 obj->config->getCellsIdField(), end);
00306                 res = PQexec(conn, buffer);
00307                 if (PQresultStatus(res) != PGRES_TUPLES_OK)
00308                 {
00309                         fprintf(stderr, "SELECT failed: %s", PQerrorMessage(conn));
00310                         PQclear(res);
00311                         PQfinish(conn);
00312                         return false;           
00313                 }
00314                 else
00315                 {
00316                         num = PQntuples(res);
00317                         MF_ASSERT(num > 0);
00318                         id_fnum  = PQfnumber(res, obj->config->getCellsIdField());
00319                         v1_fnum  = PQfnumber(res, obj->config->getCellsField(0));
00320                         v2_fnum  = PQfnumber(res, obj->config->getCellsField(1));
00321                         v3_fnum  = PQfnumber(res, obj->config->getCellsField(2));
00322                         if(sCell::getDimension() == 3)
00323                                 v4_fnum  = PQfnumber(res, obj->config->getCellsField(3));
00324                         
00325                         
00326                         for(i = 0; i < num; i++)
00327                         {
00328                                 id  = atoi(PQgetvalue(res, i, id_fnum));
00329                                 v[0]  = atoi(PQgetvalue(res, i, v1_fnum));
00330                                 v[1]  = atoi(PQgetvalue(res, i, v2_fnum));
00331                                 v[2]  = atoi(PQgetvalue(res, i, v3_fnum));
00332                                 if(sCell::getDimension() == 3)
00333                                         v[3]  = atoi(PQgetvalue(res, i, v4_fnum));
00334                                 MF_ASSERT(v[0] >= 0);
00335                                 MF_ASSERT(v[1] >= 0);
00336                                 MF_ASSERT(v[2] >= 0);
00337                                 if(sCell::getDimension() == 3)
00338                                         MF_ASSERT(v[3] >= 0);
00339                                 
00340                                 //cout << "Adicionando celula " << id << "." << endl;
00341                                 obj->malha->addCell(id,v);
00342                                 
00343                                 //if((id % 100000) == 0)
00344                                 //      cout << "Thread " << obj->id << " - cell " << id << endl;
00345                                 //sleep(2);
00346                         }
00347                 }               
00348                 start += qtd + 1;
00349                 PQclear(res);
00350         }
00351 
00352         PQfinish(conn);
00353         
00354         //cout << "Thread " << obj->id << " desconectada." << endl;
00355         
00356         //pthread_exit(NULL);
00357 
00358         return NULL;
00359 }
